## How to Participate:

1.  **Create an [iNaturalist account](https://www.inaturalist.org/signup) (if you do not have one already)**
2.  **Join the [Marquette City Nature Challenge Project](https://www.inaturalist.org/projects/city-nature-challenge-2025-marquette-mi)**
3.  **Record photos or audio of wild organisms in Marquette County during the observation period (April 25-28th)**
4.  **Upload to iNaturalist via the app or website Repeat steps 2-3 (and attend group observation events!\*)**

## Volunteer!

Do you have experience with identifying things in nature? Come help teach others; Sign up to volunteer at an event [HERE!](https://forms.gle/MA3gvFaPDroDoiym8)

## Host an Event

Interested in hosting an event as an organization? Please fill out [this interest form.](https://forms.gle/sXq5jo75zScPejhm9)
